ej,poseb102,BSN,P,mageg901,Bench jockeying $Posedel had been arguing with HP Umpire Magerkurth throughout this inning. He was taken out of the game after the inning, but kept sniping at Magerkurth, who ordered him removed from the Bees' bench.

ej,vauga101,P,jordl901,Arguing foul ball $Vaughan ejected by HP umpire Jorda for arguing that his grounder was foul ball; he threw his bat against the backstop.
$Jurges recently returned to lineup and is still sufferinng dizzy spells, leading to two pop fly doubles, so he left

$Danning crashed into Mattick on the force, causing the Cub to drop the ball; umpire Ballanfant called Danning safe, but the Cubs argued and umpire Campbell overturned the call to out, causing a vehement protest from the Giants

ej,gallj103,P,searz901,Fighting ej,passc101,P,searz901,Fighting $after two pitches well outside the strike zone (scored as a wild pitch and a passed ball), Claude Passeau was struck on the back and he threw his bat at Hugh Casey; Casey started towards Passeau but Joe Gallagher ran onto the field and tackled Passeau; both benches cleared; Gabby Hartnett pulled Gallagher off Passeau and Stan Hack punched Gallagher on the nose, drawing blood; Gallagher and Passeau ejected by HP umpire Ziggy Sears
